title: New: Sweet Valley Slumber Party – It’s Christmas (Don’t Die)
content: Well, it’s maybe not quite Christmas, but it’s certainly beginning to feel like it and who better to get you in the mood than Cali duo Sweet Valley Slumber Party and their rather macabre festive track, It’s Christmas (Don’t Die). Layers of reverb and an almost ironic tinkling of Christmas bells perfectly accompany the Best Coast style vocals. Check it out below, and hey, don’t die. Please.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
